LCTools.name: CJ_Key1
LCTools.desc: Svetlojarsk Police Station Key|This Key will open Crates inside Svetlojarsk Police Station.

LCTools.name: CJ_Key2
LCTools.desc: Berezino Police Station Key|This Key looks like it goes to a Police Station somewhere in Berezino. I wonder if it goes to both.

LCTools.name: CJ_Key7
LCTools.desc: Red Key|This Key will be opening Crates at the Tisy Military Base.
